scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm --filter 'backend' run build && pnpm --filter 'rake-request' run build
scripts.build:frontend: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm --filter 'frontend' run build
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run clean:node_modules
scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:backend & pnpm run dev:frontend
scripts.dev:backend: pnpm --filter 'backend' run dev && pnpm --filter 'rake-request' run dev
